item.title: HowTO Install HUGO
item.description: Packages that we need brew git Installing HUGO You will need first to have brew installed on your device so make sure that is up and running. Then from linux/mac just open the terminal and install HUGO. brew install hugo If everything was fine just check it with: hugo version Now a days is common to have git preinstalled by default. Anyway, if you need to check if the package is already there then:

item.title: Real First Post
item.description: First real post Welcome to blogd - blog as a service! The idea behind this blog is to keep track of whatever I’m testing at home. I will probably start with how did the setup of HUGO for the blog which is pretty much straight forward to be honest. Learning curve I really expect to have a huge learning curve just because I’ve never done such a thing and also because I’m a real “test and failure” person!
